casebody.data:
99-0447 (La. 4/1/99)

Charles Clifton MILSTEAD, Jr. v. JACKSON PARISH SCHOOL BOARD. No. 99-C-0447. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 1, 1999.

IN RE: Milstead, Charles Clifton Jr.;— Plaintiff(s); Applying for Writ of Certiora-ri and/or Review; Parish of Jackson 2nd Judicial District Court Div. “B” Number *55826,805; to the Court of Appeal, Second Circuit, Number 31804-CA

Denied.

VICTORY, J. not on panel.
